abstract: A slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region. Subjects include physical education programs at city schools, a postponed cleanup at Zuccotti Park, and the Million Trees campaign.
snippet: A slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region. Subjects include physical education programs at city schools, a postponed cleanup at Zuccotti Park, and the Million Trees campaign.

headline.main: The Week in Pictures for Oct. 21
